definition: tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
surname Qin/Qin dynasty (221-207 BC) of the first emperor 秦始皇[Qin2 Shi3 huang2]/abbr. for 陝西|陕西[Shan3 xi1]
(bird species of China) Chinese grouse (Tetrastes sewerzowi)
erhua variant of 榛仁[zhen1 ren2]

sentences.english: And this has been deeply reflected in his poems .
sentences.chinese: 這在謝榛的詩作中有着深刻的反映。

sentences.english: What about the ones the ones that were not “able to cross the road safely”?
sentences.chinese: 那些沒有“能夠安全穿越馬路”的榛睡鼠怎麼樣了？

sentences.english: Then on to our old haunt, the hazel grove.
sentences.chinese: 接着，到我們經常去的小榛樹林。

sentences.english: Hops about the size of hazel-nuts.
sentences.chinese: 蛇麻果已經像歐榛這麼大了。

sentences.english: There are two species in Corylus Linn of Heilongjiang Province, Corylus heterophlla Fisch and Corylus mandshurica Maxim.
sentences.chinese: 黑龍江省的榛屬有兩個種即平榛與毛榛。

sentences.english: There are two species in Corylus Linn of Heilongjiang Province, Corylus heterophlla Fisch and Corylus mandshurica Maxim.
sentences.chinese: 黑龍江省的榛屬有兩個種即平榛與毛榛。

sentences.english: In order to conduct the study, 50 dormice were fitted with microchips.
sentences.chinese: 爲了進行該項研究，有50只榛睡鼠被植入了晶片。

sentences.english: This thesis tries to give a brief account of the system of Xie Zhen poetry theory from the angle of category.
sentences.chinese: 本文試圖從範疇的角度來勾勒出謝榛的詩學理論體系。

sentences.english: The country mouse was sitting under a hazel thicket plucking nuts .
sentences.chinese: 鄉鼠正坐在榛樹叢下摘硬果。

sentences.english: Could the Highway Commission be more interested in saving money than saving dormice ?
sentences.chinese: 路政署委員會還能更看重資金而輕視榛睡鼠的生命嗎？

sentences.english: Te Country Mouse was sitting under a azel thicket plucking nuts.
sentences.chinese: 鄉鼠正坐在榛樹叢下摘硬果。

sentences.english: Dormice spend most of their waking hours in trees.
sentences.chinese: 榛睡鼠醒着的時間，基本都在樹上度過。

sentences.english: Chapter IV discusses Xie Zhen and Poetics at the significance of today's society.
sentences.chinese: 第四章論述謝榛及其詩學研究在當今社會的意義。

definition: Anaphalis yedoensis (pearly everlasting reed)/used in Japanese names with phonetic value Ogi
